ignoreCommand: bash -c 'if [ -z "$VERCEL_GIT_PREVIOUS_SHA" ]; then exit 1; fi; if git diff --name-only "$VERCEL_GIT_PREVIOUS_SHA" "$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_SHA" -- apps/fastify package.json packages pnpm-lock.yaml | grep -q .; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi'
buildCommand: cd ../.. && pnpm install && pnpm turbo build --filter=@repo/fastify...
